reviews.review: This one is a beloved favorite of mine. I love that they put in little secrets everywhere and things to find. Achievements are very fun to get and exploring plays a big part of the game. The game introduces new enemies, gives the Vortigaunts more character, and nailed the musical element of the game.

Los HL nunca aburren, y para mí, este es el mejorcito. Lo más divertido fue tener que esperar 12 años para tener algún tipo de anuncio para la saga. Y aún así, al jugar este, uno siente que vale la pena.
So where can I get Episode 3?
These episodes of hl2 are short but must play in my eyes.
Another expansion pack done right - arguably better than HL2 and Episode One combined.

Второй эпизод Half-Life 2 это просто класс,но какого черта она так оканчивается??? Ааааа! Теперь я понимаю всю тяжесть и грусть людей,которые ждали и ждут 3 части. Наверное Alyx никак не поможет понять,что всё-таки произошло в конце второго эпизода

[i]This review is for Half Life 2, HF2 Ep one and HF2 Ep two.[/i]
It's 2019 (as of writing this comment).

I never played Half Life 2 before, maybe because I was too young to enjoy it when it was originally released.
In 2019 I finally decided to give it a try and I got engrossed in the story from the first 5 minutes of gameplay.
The game can feel a bit monotonous, especially if you get stuck in one place for prolonged time, but the story keeps you going since you want to know what happened next.
I really liked HF games and can't wait to play HF: Alex. In fact I will probably buy VR Headset just for that.

Pros:
 - Story that keeps you interested.
 - Can be very funny at times.
 - Intriguing characters.
Cons:
 - Gameplay or puzzles can feel monotonous, especially if you can't solve them for prolonged period of time.
Наконец-то они разделили шкалу стамину/дыхание и фонарик.

É gente cheguei ao suposto ultimo jogo, pq a valve nunca terminou essa série, mas resolvi em 2019 joga todos os games do Half Life, é muita nostalgia, aliens e soldados que temos que matar, jogabilidade simples, onde só tem q seguir um retão e matar tudo que é ameaça. Valeu apena cada jogo, enredo excelente, e em 2019, mais uma analise mais um pergunta, quem é o cara com a maleta na mão de terno? kkkkkkkkkkkkk, eu aposto que é um alien disfarçado de humano.

Possível resposta na minha opinião sobre o G-Man. Os Xen, aqueles que no HL 2 estão do nosso lado, q tem um olho vermelho, q usa magia das mãos e no HL 1 era nosso inimigo, bem, no final do HL 2 eles também param o tempo pelo q entendi, podem teleporta pelo q vemos, creio eu, que o G-Man, é um deles, que pode muda a fisionomia e se disfarça de humano. Enfim é só uma teoria, um dia quem sabe a valve solta a verdadeira história do G-Man.

Recomendo 10/10.

This game expands upon the original HL2 and HL2 episode 1 which were both really good games. In this episode of Half-Life 2, the difficulty is ramped up a notch along with the introduction of new types of combine to fight.
Even better to the first one Very worth getting but I suggest playing episode one first.
If you thought the original game and episode 1 were good then this is a must have.

Excellent. Still worth playing. You won't get as much playtime from this as you would from base Half-Life 2, but you'll get a little more than from Episode 1. It's a direct continuation of Episode 1. Whereas in Episode 1 it's  entirely in an urban setting, in Episode 2 you'll have a little more variation. Between both of them, and you should get most of the setting variation present in base Half-Life 2.

从刚开始到17号城市，再一路逃离联合军的追捕，最后与反抗军一起攻击城堡，消灭邪恶的阴谋，戈登.弗里曼就是17号城市的救世主。好伙伴艾利克斯与主角返回城堡关闭反应炉，接应市民与反抗军坐火车离开17号城市，后一起前往白森林的冒险，给玩家带来了剧情上的又一次高潮！期待艾利克斯与戈登弗里曼终成眷属。
反抗军：弗里曼博士，您好，我们想加入你。
艾利克斯：弗里曼，你刚才在外面真是帅呆了。
